body:
Hi, 


Please check www.personal.psu.edu/mum13/room


and take a look at the jpegs. What is going on with chair5.jpg? It should look like chair4.jpg. Only the view is different - it is from the back of the room towards the window. Rad files are included. The material of the window is trans. Illum / mkillum is used. 


Martin
